description: Monitor for executed processes that may attempt to block indicators or events typically captured by sensors from being gathered and analyzed. Analytic 1 - Indicator Blocking - Driver Unloaded (source="*WinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" EventCode="1") OR (source="*WinEventLog:Security" EventCode="4688") Image= "fltmc.exe" AND CommandLine= "*unload*"
